Wyatt Particle Therapy Group

Creating state of the art facilities that save lives.

  • Next

Merging construction and medical technology

WPTG’s personnel have been involved with the development and construction of more Particle Therapy centers than any other company, by far. We are recognized as the industry leader for this very specific type of facility.


WPTG’s experience and knowledge with ALL the Particle Therapy vendors enables us to provide the consultant services to our clients at the earliest stages of the project development, in order to allow for informed decisions in a timely and cost-effective manner.


WPTG has developed several systems for the monitoring of the Particle Therapy pre-construction and construction processes to ensure the quality of the project meets or exceeds the expectations of all team members.

Consulting Services

  • Project Budgeting
  • Project Startup (pre-construction)
  • Constuction Monitoring
  • Quality Control
  • Vendor Interface
  • Project Closeout
